text: Dr. Mabuse the Gambler is a 1922 German crime thriller movie directed by Fritz Lang and is based on the novels by Norbert Jacques. It stars Rudolf Klein- Rogge, Aud Egede-Nissen, Gertrude Welcker, Alfred Abel, Bernhard Goetzke, Paul Richter, Georg John, Hans Adalbert Schlettow. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1922 movies Category:1920s crime movies Category:1920s epic movies Category:1920s thriller movies Category:German crime movies Category:German silent movies Category:German thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Fritz Lang Category:Dystopian movies Category:Movies set in Germany
title: Dr. Mabuse the Gambler
